title: Cant Login for a week now happening too many but still no help
body: tried everything still cant login to game client seems to happen to alot of people now still nothing...

replies.body: Are you trying to access the game through a different location, or do you have any new software that could be blocking your connection to the authentication server?  To help rule out possibilities, I suggest going over the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Hopefully that will get you through!
i play from Vietnam because i recently moved here for work and no new software
